sourcesContent:
import React, { Component, useState, useEffect } from "react"; import hero from "../Assets/Yoroi_assets/hero.png"; import first from "../Assets/Yoroi_assets/first.png"; import challenge from "../Assets/Yoroi_assets/challenge.png"; import typeface from "../Assets/Yoroi_assets/typeface.png"; import colorTheory from "../Assets/Yoroi_assets/colorTheory.png"; import browsePool from "../Assets/Yoroi_assets/browsePool.png"; import firstPool from "../Assets/Yoroi_assets/firstPool.png"; import receive from "../Assets/Yoroi_assets/receive.png"; import dcw from "../Assets/img/DCW_thumbnail.png"; import ze from "../Assets/img/ZE_thumb.png"; import after from "../Assets/DCW_assets/after.png"; import Navbar from "../components/Navbar.js"; import Footer from "./Footer"; import "../components/dcw.css"; function Yoroi() { return ( <>
Yoroi Wallet Redesign for Cardano
UX Design, UX Research, UI Design
2021
Cardano is a third generation blockchain network powered by its own cryptocurrency called ADA.
000
Background
Cardano is a third-generation blockchain networked powered by its own cryptocurrency called ADA. In 2021, Cardano is the largest Proof of Stake (PoS) blockchain network and amongst the top 5 blockchain networks behind Bitcoin and Ethereum. In the Cardano blockchain ecosystem, staking is a sustainable way to create passive income, raise money for charities and build communal equity.
001
Challenge
Novice delegators resort to online forums to learn the process of staking. How can I redesign the features in Yoroi to help ease the learning curve. I wanted to create an experience where delegators can learn the process of staking while doing it.
002
Typography & Color Theory
003
Redesign
Novice delegators resort to online forums to learn the process of staking. How can I redesign the features in Yoroi to help ease the learning curve. I wanted to create an experience where delegators can learn the process of staking while doing it.
004
Learn More
Send me an email to learn more about this project.
); } export default Yoroi;
